name: Stan Skates
description:
This is my first game I made in unity. It was fun making it.

Your goal is to avoid the obstacles and reach the end. There are three levels, with increasing difficulty and length.

Features - 

1. Added background music and sounds

2. Added two different types of power-ups

3. Added lives system. (You have four lives)

4. Win and lose screen

Known Bugs - 

1. You can use high jump power-up once before even collecting it.

Things not present in the game -

1. High score system

2. Pause button

3. Level select

Your reviews and suggestions will be valued and appreciated. Thanks for playing my game.
